author: gurukamath
content:
In a post BAL world, since the EIP changes account access gas semantics (essentially making it a two level check for code vs nocode), the EIP document could use some more clarity on when an account is marked as accessed in the BAL.

For example, say a call tries to access an account which has code. The call has enough gas to pay `COLD_ACCOUNT_COST_NOCODE=500` but not enough to pay `COLD_ACCOUNT_COST_CODE = 2600`. The account still needs to be included in the BAL as accessed, since we have to load the account first to find out if it has code.

author: gurukamath
content: This wouldn't have mattered as much in a pre-BAL world
